product_meta.title: Buddy Wash Grooming, Shampoo, Conditioner, & Deodorizer Products
product_meta.description: Style:Rinse| Flavor Name:Lavender & Mint| Size:16 ouncesThe state of your dog's coat matters. When it's irresistibly soft and shiny, it not only looks great, it feels great. Buddy Rinse dog conditioner is a spa-quality dog rinse that deeply moisturizes pup's skin and coat and leaves a light and lasting fresh scent. Use after Buddy Wash dog shampoo as part of regular pet grooming. This hydrating formula features lavender and mint, with aloe Vera, jojoba oil, chamomile extract, and vitamins E, C, A and B5. Lavender's calming effects are an extra treat for bath-shy puppies and dogs. Immediately soothes dog's skin and leaves a lustrous, velvety soft coat. Buddy Rinse is a soap-free dog rinse that is safe for you and your canine companion. – Deeply moisturizing dog conditioner that softens and detangles– Botanical extracts of lavender and mint are gentle on dog's skin, aroma therapeutic and smell amazing (not perfume)– Herbal dog rinse– Made in the USA with natural herbs and oils and free of harsh ingredients– Soap-free Ingredients: Herbal conditioner base, aloe Vera juice, essence of lavender, essence of mint, wheat protein extract, rose hip oil, kuku nut oil, olive oil, wheat germ oil, jojoba oil, chamomile extract, sage extract, nettle extract, rosemary extract, allantois, vitamin E, vitamin C, vitamin A, vitamin B5. About Buddy Wash Buddy Wash began when a couple of pet lovers couldn't find wholesome grooming products for their pets' unique needs, so they decided to make them themselves. They developed refreshing spritzers and nourishing shampoos and conditioners using simple ingredients and no harsh chemicals. Every product is safe for humans and pets, made in the USA and never tested on animals. Try our other grooming products: Buddy Wash: shampoo & conditioner to nourish skin and make coats velvety soft Buddy Rinse: leave in conditioner, added after bath to moisturize and fresh scent Buddy Splash: deodorizer & conditioner to refresh your dog's coat with lasting scent
feature_bullets: Herbal dog conditioner – deeply moisturizing dog conditioner made in the USA with ingredients from the garden.

Pet Grooming, for all – for long or short, thick or thin, curly or straight, smooth or coarse coats. Reduces shedding and quickly detangles.
With botanical extracts – Our dog conditioner is formulated to nourish and relax, with botanical extracts of lavender and mint, chamomile extract and vitamin E.
Safe and gentle – This dog rinse is a safe and gentle way to get your dog's coat soft, shiny and tangle-free.
